title: I go 0/2/38 as nami...
body:
Rito says I get A-.

seems legIt......

seriously though, I feel like their grading methods for support should really analyze it a bit better..... i think a 2/2/21 nami did less than a 0/2/38 one... but kills make the LoL universe go round.

As an aside, I don't think game duration is factored in at all... i can go 4/1/1 with good cs as rek'sai and they ff20 and I get a B-.... but my 14-8-13 game that lasted 45 minutes I get an S. I get that in one I did a lot more kill wise... but mid/late games tend to snowball... i dunno. I love the fact we get grades, but I am conflicted because I don't really know what riot constitues as good/better compared to the other people playing that champ in that role.... (which is what they compare you to in order to give you a grade)

Should lack of deaths factor in more than they currently are?

Any thoughts?
